clauses.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
clauses.description: The Agreements can be updated at any time, including in a way that negatively affects user rights, without notifying before or after the changes.
clauses.clause_text:
We may modify these Terms and other terms related to your use of the Services (like our Privacy Policy) from time to time, by posting the changed terms on the OSMF website.
All changes will be effective immediately upon posting to the OSMF website unless they specify a later date.

case.text: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you

clauses.title: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent merely from your usage.
clauses.description: The Service infers your acceptance from your continued usage, instead of prompting you to read the new Terms and asking for direct consent. This doesn’t apply to services that have no way to seek consent from users through their contact details or an account.
clauses.clause_text: your continued use of the Services after new Terms become effective constitutes your binding acceptance of the new Terms.

case.text: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent to changes of terms merely from your usage.

clauses.title: Your use is throttled
clauses.description: The service may impose limits or restrictions to the use of the service, thus negatively impacting users experience. They may do so without reason or prior notice.
clauses.clause_text: We retain the right to create limits on use and storage at our sole discretion at any time with or without notice.

case.text: Your use is throttled

clauses.title: You shall not interfere with another person's enjoyment of the service
clauses.description:
Users are asked not to interfere with another person't enjoyment in using the service.
However, this statement is very vague and open to interpretation by the service itself.
clauses.clause_text: You may not use the Services in any manner that could damage or overburden the Services or interfere with any other party's use of the Services.

case.text: You shall not interfere with another person's enjoyment of the service

clauses.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
clauses.description: Your data is stored all over the world, including in countries where data protection rules may differ from the ones of the service's jurisdiction or those of your country jurisdiction.
clauses.clause_text: Because our Services are used by people all over the world, personal information that we collect may be stored and processed in any other country in which we or our agents maintain facilities.

case.text: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

clauses.title: The service is only available in some countries approved by its government
clauses.description: Countries under embargo or banned by the government of the country in question cannot use the service.
clauses.clause_text: You represent you are not, and are not controlled by, an individual, organization or entity organized or located in a country or territory that is the target of sanctions imposed, or on any restricted or sanctioned party list maintained by the United Kingdom.

case.text: The service is only available in some countries approved by its government

clauses.title: Content is published under a free license instead of a bilateral one
clauses.description: User-generated content, such as posts or comments, is published under a free license, meaning other users can reuse it (e.g. Creative Commons license).
clauses.clause_text: OpenStreetMap (“OSM”) data available through these Services is licensed under the Open Database License as interpreted by the OSMF Guidelines.

case.text: Content is published under a free license instead of a bilateral one

clauses.title: The service allows you to opt out of providing personal information to third parties
clauses.description: The Service provides opt-out instructions to the share of (some) personal information with third parties.
clauses.clause_text:
Gravatar

The openstreetmap.org website supports the display of Gravatars, these are retrieved from gravatar.com by generating a globally unique key from your e-mail address. Our website software will check on the initial signup and on every email address change if you have a Gravatar for the new address and start displaying it if one exists. You can stop this behaviour by explicitly turning Gravatar support off in your account settings. You should be aware that, if a Gravatar is displayed, the key can be used to track your account over any website that has Gravatar support.

case.text: You can opt out of providing personal information to third parties

clauses.title: The service does not share user information with third parties
clauses.description: Information collected from users by this service is not given to third parties.
clauses.clause_text: No personal information or information that is linked to an individual will be released to third parties, except as required by law.

case.text: Your personal data is not shared with third parties

clauses.title: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.
clauses.clause_text: What data do we store and process?

case.text: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect

clauses.title: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users
clauses.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the GDPR.
clauses.clause_text: If you are a resident of the EU, EEA, or EFTA, your information will be stored and processed in accordance with the GDPR.

case.text: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users

clauses.title: The service allows you to use pseudonyms
clauses.description: You don't need to provide your full name to use the Service and you are allowed to use a pseudonym instead.
clauses.clause_text:
• you can select a non identifying login name and change it at any time you want,
  • you are not required to include personal data in diary posts, comments, email listserv, the wiki, or other OSM communications methods,

case.text: Pseudonyms are allowed

clauses.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
clauses.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.
clauses.clause_text: You are free to stop using the Services any time.

case.text: You have the right to leave this service at any time

clauses.title: The service is not responsible for linked or (clearly) quoted content from third-party content providers
clauses.clause_text: We are not responsible for the content, data, or actions of third parties,

case.text: The service is not responsible for linked or (clearly) quoted content from third-party content providers

clauses.title: You are responsible for any risks, damages, or losses that may incur by downloading materials
clauses.description: Users are responsible for any harm to their computer system or loss of data they may incur through the download of materials from the service.
clauses.clause_text: Any material downloaded or otherwise obtained through your use of our Services is done at your own discretion and risk, and you will be solely responsible for any damage to your computer system or loss of data that results from the download of any such material.

case.text: You are responsible for any risks, damages, or losses that may incur by downloading materials

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text: Adopted by the OSMF board on September the 20th 2018.

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text:
OpenStreetMap Foundation Services Terms of Use

Adopted by the OSMF board on September the 20th 2018.

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: Blocking cookies may limit your ability to use the service
clauses.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.
clauses.clause_text:
Cookies

Numerous OSMF operated services use cookies to store information on your login and site navigation state. We also use cookies and similar technologies to recognize and improve your use of our websites.. You may delete cookies from your computer, and most browsers provide the option to block them. If you block cookies placed by us (first party cookies), you will not be able to access parts of the OSMF websites and services that require a login. However, your access to our websites will not be affected if you disable cookies placed by third parties.

case.text: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

clauses.title: This service can delete your content if you violate the terms
clauses.description: Content infringing the Terms of Service (or the Acceptable Use Policy or equivalent) may be removed, with or without notice.
clauses.clause_text: we may cancel or suspend your account for violation of any policy as determined by the Data Working Group or other Working Group.

case.text: Your content can be deleted if you violate the terms

clauses.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service
clauses.description: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs, including tangible (e.g. profits) and intangible losses (e.g. data), resulting from the use or inability to use the service or any other matter relating to the service.
clauses.clause_text:
Limitation on liability

Highlighted for emphasis

The OSMF will not be liable to you or to any other party for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential or exemplary damages, including but not limited to, damages for loss of profits, goodwill, use, data, or other intangible losses, regardless of whether we were advised of the possibility of such damage. In no event shall our liability exceed one thousand British pounds (GBP 1000.00) in aggregate. In the case that applicable law may not allow the limitation or exclusion of liability or incidental or consequential damages, the above limitation or exclusion may not apply to you, although our liability will be limited to the fullest extent permitted by applicable law.

case.text: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service

clauses.title: They may stop providing the service at any time
clauses.description: They may discontinue the services without prior notice, at any time, for any or no reason. They usually assume no liability for losses and damages resulting from this suspension.
clauses.clause_text: we reserve the right to suspend or end the Services at any time, with or without cause, and with or without notice.

case.text: They may stop providing the service at any time

clauses.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
clauses.description: The service provider expressly does not claim to provide uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service.
clauses.clause_text: We make no warranty that our Services will meet your requirements, be safe, secure, uninterrupted, timely, accurate, or error-free, or that your information will be secure.

case.text: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

clauses.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk
clauses.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.
clauses.clause_text: We provide the Services on an "as is" and "as available" basis, and we expressly disclaim all express or implied warranties of all kinds, including but not limited to the implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement.

case.text: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk

clauses.title: You are prohibited from attempting to gain unauthorized access to other computer systems
clauses.description: The service does not allow any attempts at hacking or otherwise gaining unauthorized access to other users' computers.
clauses.clause_text: Interfere with or attempt to gain unauthorized access to any computer network;

case.text: You are prohibited from attempting to gain unauthorized access to other computer systems

clauses.title: Users who have been permanently banned from this service are not allowed to re-register under a new account
clauses.description: Once users have been permanently banned from this service, they are not allowed to create a new account to keep using the service.
clauses.clause_text:
Upon cancellation or suspension, your right to use the Services will stop immediately.
Attempting to evade a cancellation or suspension (such as by creating a new account or using an alternate account) is a violation of these Terms.

case.text: Users who have been permanently banned from this service are not allowed to re-register under a new account

clauses.title: This service is only available to users of a certain age
clauses.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.
clauses.clause_text:
You must be 13 years or older to use the Services.

If you are at least 13 but under 16 years of age, a parent or other adult authorized by your parent may create an account for you to use.

case.text: This service is only available to users over a certain age

clauses.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
clauses.description: This service makes no warranty regarding the accuracy or reliability of any information that is given on its website or the results that may be obtained from the use of the service.
clauses.clause_text: Therefore, we do not represent or guarantee the truthfulness, accuracy, or reliability of any submitted community content.

case.text: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided

clauses.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
clauses.description: Should any portion of the Terms of Service be unenforceable or invalid, that portion will be enforced to the fullest extent permitted by applicable law and the remainder of the TOS will remain valid and enforceable.
clauses.clause_text: If any provision of these Terms is held to be unlawful, void, or for any reason unenforceable, then that provision shall be deemed severable from these Terms and shall not affect the validity and enforceability of any remaining provisions.

case.text: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

clauses.title: You must report to the service any unauthorized use of your account or any breach of security
clauses.description: The service asks the user to notify them immediately of any unauthorized use or security breaches.
clauses.clause_text: You agree to promptly notify OSMF in writing if you become aware of any misappropriation or unauthorized use of the Services.

case.text: You must report to the service any unauthorized use of your account or any breach of security

clauses.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
clauses.description: Your personal data is used for statistics in a de-identified/aggregated form (i.e. not directly linked to a unique identity) to analyse trends, for research and for analytics.
